DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study look effect carbohydrate restrict , high protein , high fat diet weight loss health outcome woman participate Curves Fitness Weight Loss Program .
DOC.brief_title: Effects Diet Manipulation Women Curves Program
DOC.detailed_description: The purpose study determine carbohydrate restrict , high protein , high fat diet ( 20 % carbohydrate , 45 % protein , 35 % fat ; CC-II ) promote favorable change weight loss health outcome compare traditional high carbohydrate , low protein , low fat diet ( 55 % carbohydrate , 15 % protein , 30 % fat ; AHA ) Curves moderate carbohydrate restrict , high protein , low fat diet ( 30 % carbohydrate , 45 % protein , 25 % fat ; CC-I ) .
DOC.criteria: The participant apparently healthy female The participant age 18 60 The participant pregnant nursing , plan become pregnant next 12 month pregnant past 12 month The participant uncontrolled metabolic disorder include know electrolyte abnormality ; heart disease , arrhythmia , diabetes , thyroid disease , hypogonadism ; history hypertension , hepatorenal , musculoskeletal , autoimmune , neurological disease The participant currently take thyroid , hyperlipidemic , hypoglycemic , antihypertensive , androgenic medication The participant take ergogenic level nutritional supplement may affect muscle mass ( e.g. , creatine , HMB ) , anabolic/catabolic hormone level ( androstenedione , DHEA , etc . ) weight loss ( e.g. , ephedra , thermogenics , etc . ) within past three month The participant willing participate regular moderate exercise program
